message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.MA 

The paper deals with the problem of regret minimization in non-stochastic multi-armed bandit problems, which is a well-studied problem in machine learning and optimization. The paper proposes a new algorithm for this problem and provides high-probability regret bounds for it. This makes it likely to belong to the following sub-categories: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms)
- cs.IT (Information Theory)
- cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems)
